trans-unit.resname: MOC·1 | Bright-Palm, Soul Awakener | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 醒魂师明掌

trans-unit.resname: MOC·1 | Bright-Palm, Soul Awakener | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Backup 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. If that's another creature, it gains the following ability until end of turn.)
trans-unit.target: 后援1（当此生物进战场时，在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。若后者是另一个生物，则它获得下文之异能直到回合结束。）

trans-unit.resname: MOC·1 | Bright-Palm, Soul Awakener | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever this creature attacks, double the number of +1/+1 counters on target creature. That creature can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当此生物攻击时，将目标生物上的+1/+1指示物数量加倍。该生物本回合不能被力量等于或小于2的生物阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·2 | Brimaz, Blight of Oreskos | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 俄瑞恣荒王布黎玛

trans-unit.resname: MOC·2 | Brimaz, Blight of Oreskos | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a Phyrexian creature or artifact creature spell, incubate X, where X is that spell's mana value. (Create an Incubator token with X +1/+1 counters on it and "{2}: Transform this artifact." It transforms into a 0/0 Phyrexian artifact creature.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放非瑞人生物或神器生物咒语时，抚育X，X为该咒语的法术力值。（派出一个上面有X个+1/+1指示物的抚育器衍生物，且具有「{2}：转化此神器。」它转化为0/0非瑞人神器生物。）

trans-unit.resname: MOC·2 | Brimaz, Blight of Oreskos | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each end step, if a Phyrexian died under your control this turn, proliferate.
trans-unit.target: 在每个结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有非瑞人在你的操控下死去，则增殖。

If it would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)

trans-unit.target: 每当你施放自己每个回合中你的第一个咒语时，放逐目标对手的牌库顶牌并派出一个珍宝衍生物。然后如果它是法术力值小于由你操控之神器数量的咒语，则你可以施放所放逐的牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。若你未以此法施放之，则你本回合中可以施放该牌。

trans-unit.target: 吉拉波

trans-unit.resname: MOC·51 | Ghirapur | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, until end of turn, each noncreature, non-Vehicle artifact you control becomes a 5/3 Vehicle in addition to its other types and gains trample, haste, and crew 2.
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，直到回合结束，每个由你操控且既非生物也非载具的神器均成为5/3载具，且仍具有原本类别，并获得践踏、敏捷与搭载2。

trans-unit.target: 登殿（如果你操控十个或更多永久物，则于这盘游戏接下来的时段中，你得到黄金城祝福。）

trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，你可以将一张永久物牌从你手上横置放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·216 | Wildwood Escort | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return target creature or battle card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，将目标生物或战役牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·216 | Wildwood Escort | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If CARDNAME would die, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果CARDNAME将死去，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·217 | Wrenn and Realmbreaker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wrenn and Realmbreaker
trans-unit.target: 芮恩与洞境树

trans-unit.resname: MOM·217 | Wrenn and Realmbreaker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的地具有「{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。」

trans-unit.resname: MOM·217 | Wrenn and Realmbreaker | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Up to one target land you control becomes a 3/3 Elemental creature with vigilance, hexproof, and haste until your next turn. It's still a land.
trans-unit.target: +1：至多一个目标由你操控的地成为3/3，具警戒、辟邪与敏捷异能的元素生物直到你的下一个回合。它仍然是地。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·217 | Wrenn and Realmbreaker | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−2]: Mill three cards. You may put a permanent card from among the milled cards into your hand.
trans-unit.target: −2：磨三张牌。你可以将一张永久物牌从所磨掉之牌中置于你手上。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·217 | Wrenn and Realmbreaker | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: [−7]: You get an emblem with "You may play lands and cast permanent spells from your graveyard."
trans-unit.target: −7：你获得具有以下异能的徽记～「你可以从你的坟墓场中使用地和施放永久物咒语。」

trans-unit.resname: MOM·218 | Baral and Kari Zev | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Baral and Kari Zev
trans-unit.target: 巴罗与卡丽泽夫

trans-unit.resname: MOM·218 | Baral and Kari Zev | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: First strike, menace
trans-unit.target: 先攻，威慑

trans-unit.resname: MOM·218 | Baral and Kari Zev | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast your first instant or sorcery spell each turn, you may cast a spell with lesser mana value that shares a card type with it from your hand without paying its mana cost. If you don't, create First Mate Ragavan, a legendary 2/1 red Monkey Pirate creature token. It gains haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放每回合中你的第一个瞬间或法术咒语时，你可以从你手上施放一个法术力值比它小、又与之具共通牌张类别的咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。若你未如此作，则派出传奇衍生生物勒格文大副，其为2/1红色的猴／海盗。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·219 | Borborygmos and Fblthp | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Borborygmos and Fblthp
trans-unit.target: 咕噜力莫与夫毕佐

trans-unit.resname: MOM·219 | Borborygmos and Fblthp | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, draw a card, then you may discard any number of land cards. When you discard one or more cards this way, CARDNAME deals twice that much damage to target creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME进战场或攻击时，抓一张牌，然后你可以弃任意数量的地牌。每当你以此法弃一张或数张牌时，CARDNAME对目标生物造成该数量两倍的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·219 | Borborygmos and Fblthp | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}{U}: Put CARDNAME into its owner's library third from the top.
trans-unit.target: {1}{U}：将CARDNAME置于其拥有者的牌库顶数来第三张的位置。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·220 | Botanical Brawler | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Botanical Brawler
trans-unit.target: 植生好斗者

trans-unit.resname: MOM·220 | Botanical Brawler | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Trample
trans-unit.target: 践踏

trans-unit.resname: MOM·220 | Botanical Brawler | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有两个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·220 | Botanical Brawler | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on another permanent you control, if it's the first time +1/+1 counters have been put on that permanent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当在另一个由你操控的永久物上放置一个或数个+1/+1指示物时，若这是本回合中第一次在该永久物上放置+1/+1指示物，则在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·221 | Djeru and Hazoret | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Djeru and Hazoret
trans-unit.target: 杰鲁与哈佐蕾

trans-unit.resname: MOM·221 | Djeru and Hazoret | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as you have one or fewer cards in hand, CARDNAME has vigilance and haste.
trans-unit.target: 只要你的手牌为一张或更少，CARDNAME便具有警戒与敏捷异能。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·221 | Djeru and Hazoret | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, look at the top six cards of your library. You may exile a legendary creature card from among them. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Until end of turn, you may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，检视你牌库顶的六张牌。你可以放逐其中一张传奇生物牌。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。直到回合结束，你可以施放所放逐的牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: Flying, vigilance
trans-unit.target: 飞行，警戒

trans-unit.resname: MOM·222 | Drana and Linvala | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Activated abilities of creatures your opponents control can't be activated.
trans-unit.target: 由对手操控的生物之起动式异能都不能起动。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·222 | Drana and Linvala | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME has all activated abilities of all creatures your opponents control. You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to activate those abilities.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME具有所有由对手操控之生物的所有起动式异能。你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来起动这些异能。

trans-unit.target: 妖精司缸

trans-unit.resname: MOM·223 | Elvish Vatkeeper | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, incubate 2. (Create an Incubator token with two +1/+1 counters on it and "{2}: Transform this artifact." It transforms into a 0/0 Phyrexian artifact creature.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，抚育2。（派出一个上面有两个+1/+1指示物的抚育器衍生物，且具有「{2}：转化此神器。」它转化为0/0非瑞人神器生物。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·223 | Elvish Vatkeeper | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may pay {X}. When you do, you may cast target instant or sorcery card with mana value X from a graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile two nonland cards with mana value 4 or less. You may cast one of those two cards without paying its mana cost. Put one of them into your hand. Then put the other cards exiled this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐两张法术力值等于或小于4的非地牌为止。这两张牌中，你可以施放其中一张，且不需支付其法术力费用；将其中一张置于你手上。然后将以此法放逐的其他牌依随机顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.source: Target player draws two cards. You may put an artifact card from your hand onto the battlefield. Create a token that's a copy of a permanent you control. Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three creatures you control. Destroy target permanent an opponent controls.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手抓两张牌。你可以将一张神器牌从你手上放进战场。派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为一个由你操控的永久物之复制品。将三个+1/+1指示物分配给一个，两个或三个由你操控的生物。消灭目标由对手操控的永久物。
